top_comments.comment: Visit https://simplisafe.com/modustrial to learn more and to get at least 30% off your SimpliSafe security system!
bit late but have a look at a kitchen working triangle

comments_since_last_sample.body:
Get real handles for all of your doors. This is a kitchen. You will have greasy fingers at some point.
You want to open the doors and draws as easy as possible even if you have something in your hand.
Its hard to wait a month for a video.... oh boy! here we go again!
no pull! especially if you're getting all that hardware for free!
